title: Yesterday, I set the audio source using a special screen
content:
Yesterday, I set the audio source using a special screen that can only be accessed by right-clicking with the mouse in the browser, and now I can't undo it. I'm having trouble because the special screen doesn't appear even when I perform the same operation. (It's not a normal audio source settings screen that can be easily accessed, such as a site-specific screen.) The original text is in Japanese.

Translated with DeepL.com (free version)
creator: mm2255j
